(My apologies, I forgot that the Predacons are blocking coms at the Maxi 
base, so this is a new post that is a correction of my last)



Smokescreen/Beachcomber:



Smokescreen saw the missile hit the Ark.  Activating his com, he found it was 
full of static.  Cursing, he took out his electro-distruptor rifle, heading 
for the source of the missile.

---

Beachcomber activated his com as he felt the Ark shake lightly.  Static.  
"Slag, our coms are jammed!" he yelloed, running towards the exit of the Ark.
